original_text: But if the spot is white in the skin of his body and appears no deeper than the skin, and the hair in it has not turned white, the priest shall shut up the diseased person for seven days.
korean_text: 피부에 색점이 희나 우묵하지 아니하고 그 털이 희지 아니하면 제사장은 그 환자를 이레 동안 가두어둘 것이며

sentences.original_text: But if the spot is white in the skin of his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 몸의 피부에 반점이 희고

sentences.original_text: and appears no deeper than the skin
and the hair in it has not turned white
the priest shall shut up the diseased person
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그 병든 사람을 격리해야 하며
